channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Smart Floating / Sticky Buttons – Call, Sharing, Chat Widgets & More – Buttonizer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Smart Floating / Sticky Buttons – Call, Sharing, Chat Widgets & More – Buttonizer

item.title: CVE-2021-24992|2024-08-03T19:49:14.555Z -- unknown -- smart%20floating%20%2F%20sticky%20buttons%20%E2%80%93%20call%2C%20sharing%2C%20chat%20widgets%20%26%20more%20%E2%80%93%20buttonizer
item.description: The Smart Floating / Sticky Buttons WordPress plugin before 2.5.5 does not sanitise and escape some parameter before outputting them in attributes and page, which could allow high privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
